page.title: 02Coltishall children (1 of 2)
page.content: We wrote a Questionnaire for the children in the local school to answer about their daily lives. We found that quite a lot of what they thought and felt was very similar to our thoughts. For instance most of them enjoyed playing computer and video games at home. They thought that their village didn't have enough entertainment, they wanted a sports centre and a swimming pool. Several children wanted a cinema. They all said there was not enough to do at night time. Their attitude to the airbase was surprising. We thought that they would not like the noise but most of them said that they hardly ever thought about it. They had mixed feelings about their ambitions, some said they would like to live in a big city, others that they would like to live abroad. (cont next page)
